basics.name: Samy Badreddine
basics.label: Research Scientist, PhD Student
basics.summary: I am a Research Scientist at Sony AI in Barcelona, Spain, where I work with complex predictions in biomedical Knowledge Graphs. I am also pursuing my PhD at Fondazione Bruno Kessler in Trento, Italy. My research interests combine Neurosymbolic AI and Probabilistic ML, spanning from foundational aspects such as differentiability and optimization to practical and usable solutions.

work.name: Sony AI
work.summary: Neurosymbolic AI and Generative AI research particularily for Knowledge Graph Prediction.
Foundational research in Neurosymbolic AI. Hypothesis generation in biomedical domains. AI solutions for ingredient pairing and recipe creation. Machine learning for odor perception.
